hero_section.title: Helping seniors live well
hero_section.paragraph: To see who we serve become a family again.

make_families_whole_section.title: Making Families Whole Again
make_families_whole_section.paragraph: Trying to balance being a family member with being a caregiver can be stressful and exhausting. We’d like to help relieve some of that strain so all you have to focus on is being a family.

icon_box_one.title: Memory Care
icon_box_one.paragraph: We offer both in-home and community care purposefully and specially designed to aid those with cognitive challenges caused by memory impairment, dementia, and Alzheimer’s.

icon_box_two.title: Respite Care
icon_box_two.paragraph: Caregiving is often an around-the-clock commitment. Whether it’s a few hours or a few weeks, respite care can give you the peace of mind that your loved one is still being well taken care of, even when you can’t.

who_abide_is_for_section.title: Who Abide is for
who_abide_is_for_section.paragraph: We are mindful that each family comes to us with a unique set of needs. Whether you need companionship for a few hours a day, or around the clock care, we’re here for you.

the_benefits_section.title: The benefits
the_benefits_section.paragraph: For our seniors: prolonged independence. For their families: peace of mind.

hero_section.title: How we can serve you
hero_section.paragraph: Our quality in-home care helps provide you or a loved one with an enhanced lifestyle & ongoing independence.

service.title: Hygiene
service.paragraph: From personal hygiene to light housekeeping, we’re here to help with respectful, attentive care.

service.title: Daily Errands
service.paragraph: Wherever our seniors may need to go, we’re always ready to provide safe, reliable transportation.

service.title: Memory Care
service.paragraph: We offer both in-home and community care purposefully and specially designed to aid those living with Alzheimer’s and other forms of dementia.

service.title: Respite Care
service.paragraph: Whether it’s a few hours or a few weeks, respite care can give you the peace of mind that your loved one is still being well taken care of, even when you can’t.

service.title: Companionship
service.paragraph: Preventing social isolation is crucial to maintaining good mental health in seniors who may not interact with many people daily.

service.title: Dignified Care
service.paragraph: Every person deserves compassionate, responsive care. Our team is dedicated to ensuring that our seniors are always heard and cared for accordingly.

trusted_caregiver_section.pretitle: 24 hours a day, 365 days a year
trusted_caregiver_section.title: Trusted Caregivers
trusted_caregiver_section.paragraph: You can trust our caregivers with the safety and well-being of your loved one because every Georgia Living In Home caregiver is thoroughly screened, trained, insured, and supervised by a Registered Nurse.

qualifications.title: Certified Nurse Aide or Personal  Care Assistant certification
